name: write
description:
Create or overwrite file. Creates parent directories if needed.

PREFER {{tool:write}} when:
- Creating new files
- File is small (<50 lines) - simpler than patching
- Rewriting most of file content
- After {{tool:apply_patch}}/{{tool:edit}} failure

WORKFLOW:
1. {{tool:read}} file first to see current content
2. Include ALL content you want in the file (write overwrites completely)
3. Do NOT guess content - copy unchanged parts from read output

Examples:
- {{tool:write}}({"path": "config.json", "content": "{\"debug\": true}"})
- {{tool:write}}({"path": "app.js", "content": "..."})

Returns: ok: created/updated path, +N lines
